document.full_text: at least 16 people were killed in pakistan on saturday after a bomb hit a truck carrying fuel for nato forces in afghanistan, the latest attack in an upsurge of violence since osama bin laden was killed.
document.title: sixteen killed in nato fuel truck blast in pakistan
lines_and_colors: at least 16 people were killed in pakistan on saturday after a bomb hit a truck carrying fuel for nato forces in afghanistan, the latest attack in an upsurge of violence since osama bin laden was killed.
